definition: A solemn ritual or ceremony held to commemorate and honor the life of a deceased individual, typically involving religious or cultural customs and practices. It is commonly conducted as part of the process of bidding farewell to the departed and providing closure for the grieving family and friends.

examples.german: Die Beerdigungszeremonie fand in der Kirche statt.
examples.english: The funeral ceremony took place in the church.
The funeral ceremony was very emotional.

examples.english: The funeral ceremony was conducted by a priest.
The funeral ceremony lasted for several hours.
